casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dean Michael VARNER 115P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2017 John F. Carella, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Varner, Dean Michael. Caroline Farmer, Deputy Director, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of April 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of April 2017."
